description: Articles and videos from The NY Times on investment advisers, including information on how to select a financial planner and what a stock broker can do for your retirement plan, college saving and other personal finance needs.
title: Financial Planners
title_page: Financial Planners - The New York Times
text: If you’ve landed here, it means you’ve realized that you might need some professional advice in handling your financial affairs. That’s where financial planners come in. Unlike old-fashioned stockbrokers, financial planners can offer advice on diverse topics, like investing, mortgages and basic budgeting. What follows is advice on how to pick the best financial planner.
